definition: lit. true religion/orthodox religion/orthodox Christianity/Islam (in the writing of Chinese or Hui theologians)
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
Exegesis of true religion by Wang Daiyu 王岱輿|王岱舆[Wang2 Dai4 yu2], a study of Islam/also translated as Real hermeneutics of orthodox religion

sentences.english: Most believers amongst the Russian minority are Eastern Orthodox.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯族中大部分人信仰東正教。

sentences.english: This is the first day of the Greek Orthodox Great Lent.
sentences.chinese: 這是希臘東正教大齋期的第一天。

sentences.english: Now she's teaching her less fortunate older sisters to read.
sentences.chinese: 現在他正教那些沒那麼幸運的姐姐們讀書。

sentences.english: Please remember us Japanese orthodox christians in your fervent prayers.
sentences.chinese: 請記住我們日本正教信徒的祈禱。

sentences.english: The once mighty Russian church became, on sufferance, a eunuch of the state.
sentences.chinese: 曾經一段強勢的俄羅斯東正教沒有了實際能力。

sentences.english: The Russian Orthodox Church canonized the czar and his family in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 俄國東正教於2000年封沙皇及其家人爲聖徒。
全世界最北邊的東正教堂。

sentences.english: Chen Hai is an English teacher. He's teaching Mr Li.
sentences.chinese: 陳海是一名英語老師，他正教李先生。

sentences.english: After 1054, the Church was divided into the Roman Catholic Church and the Eastern Orthodox Church.
sentences.chinese: 1054年後，羅馬教會分裂爲羅馬天主教和東正教。

sentences.english: How to improve the productivity of the non-profit organizations;
sentences.chinese: 與非盈利公衆組織猶太正教聯盟的合作。

sentences.english: Maslenitsa is a pagan holiday marking the end of winter.
sentences.chinese: 謝肉節是東正教的節日，慶祝冬天的結束。

sentences.english: Is it possible for there to be an operating Noahide community under Orthodox Jewish supervision?
sentences.chinese: 諾亞堂可否在猶太正教管理下單獨運作？

sentences.english: She is often referred to as "Theotokos" in Eastern Orthodox hymns.
sentences.chinese: 她在東正教的讚美詩中被提出及到爲“神的母親”。

sentences.english: We used to play at ethnic festivals and Orthodox weddings.
sentences.chinese: 我們曾經在傳統節日和東正教婚禮上演奏。
